Protocol_14.m file
Short, all high contrast, protocol.
Different 'interval' stimuli - flicker - static gratings - all ON - all
OFF

## Protocol Parameters

| Parameter | Value |
|:----------|:------|
| Conditions | 0 |
| Patterns Used | 2 |
| t_acclim | 10s |
| t_pause | 0.015 |
| trial_len | 10s |
